document_data.mainbody:
harp-eye Sluck was a goblin archer, as well as a member of the Cult of the Absolute, who lived in the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
She wore a crude cuirass of goblin-made scale armor over a simple leather tunic and cloth pants.
The shaft of her crude bow was crafted from some manner of bone.
In the , Sluck was among the goblins celebrating the cults raid on the nearby Waukeens Rest inn.
